explains: v. 相异，出现分歧；岔开，分开； 分化，偏离；使偏离，使分叉；（数）发散
wordGroup: diverge from 背道而驰；背离

sentences.en: Opinions diverge greatly on this issue.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上意见分歧很大。

sentences.en: The parallel lines appear to diverge.
sentences.cn: 这些平行线像是岔开了。

sentences.en: Second, it appears that closely related populations of fishes on both sides of the isthmus are starting to genetically diverge from each other.
sentences.cn: 其次，地峡两侧紧密相关的鱼类种群似乎开始在基因上彼此分化。
